Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Irving Park/Sheridan
ShortDescription: Southbound 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Irving Park, Marine, and Inner Lake Shore due to, street blockage at Irving Park/Sheridan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Irving Park, Marine, and Inner Lake Shore due to, street blockage at Irving Park/Sheridan.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 87th/Constance
ShortDescription: Westbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Jeffery, Stony Island, and 87th due to, street blockage near 87th/Constance.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Jeffery, Stony Island, and 87th due to, street blockage near 87th/Constance.
